entry.tran: 精于讨好卖乖的人；马屁精
entry.def: If you call someone a goody-goody, you mean they behave extremely well in order to please people in authority.

means.word_mean: 1. a person who behaves extremely well in order to please a superior
1. affectedly or smugly good or self-righteous

auth_sentence.content: Four year olds often sound goody-goody as well as bossy.

means.word_mean: 善于伪装以讨好(家长或老师等)的人；会巴结的人

sentences.en: He’s a real goody two-shoes. He’d never do anything that might get him into trouble.
sentences.cn: 他那么个八面玲珑的人，才不会自惹麻烦呢。
